title: Chief Minister Wigneswaran – How about defending Sri Lankan Tamils against Indian Poachers?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Its all fine to be issuing statements about being a martyr for the Sri Lankan Tamils. However, Chief Minister Wigneswaran and the TNA has failed the test of putting their actions where the mouths claim to say they represent Sri Lanka’s Tamils. With not a hum coming from him…
